title: Fig and maple bourbon fizz

ingredients.content: 10 fresh figs (approx. 200 g), cut into halves

preparations.content: Place a clean glass jar on top of mixing bowl lid. Weigh bourbon into jar then place figs into jar and seal. Set aside for 5-7 days to infuse, giving the jar a gentle shake each day. Once infused, strain bourbon through a fine mesh sieve into a clean glass jar. Retain figs and set aside until use.
Place ice cubes into mixing bowl and crush <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add 120 g of the fig-infused bourbon, 2 of the reserved bourbon-infused figs, cut into halves and all remaining ingredients and combine <b>10 sec//speed 2<b>. Divide between four glasses, placing half a fig in each glass to serve.

hintsAndTricks: If fresh figs are not in season, replace with dried figs cut into halves.
Use leftover strained figs in cakes or jam.
